comments: This contract was competitively sourced.The Canada Gazette (CG) publishes 2 publications per week and ensures they are compliant with Treasury Board Common Look and Feel (CLF) guidelines and W3 standards. To do this, the HTML versions are generated by Word script and InDesign in order to assure the CLF compliancy, and the Web Master and the Intermediate Web Support need to edit and apply changes on the HTML tag in order to validate code with W3C validation tools. To help manage the workload, a temporary resource was needed to help and support employees with the maintenance of the Gazette web site and TB web standard; do corrections in HTML, XHTML, HTML5 tags; validate documents using W3C validation tools, Dreamweaver and PWGSC validation tools; edit web pages and adjust HTML5 Tags to meets the CLF2 requirements and create pages when needed to be uploaded on GC sites
